Maaf Ronaldo, Pemain Penting Juventus Saat Ini adalah Pjanic
07 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Tidak jarang nama Miralem Pjanic dikabarkan berada di pintu keluar Juventus selama beberapa musim panas kemarin. Namun kini, pria berkebangsaan Bosnia tersebut bertransformasi menjadi sosok 'Jorginho yang baru' bersama Maurizio Sarri.
Seperti halnya Jorginho, Pjanic juga mengontrol permainan dari sisi dalam penyerangan. Ia seringkali diapit oleh dua gelandang lain yang siap membantunya membawa bola ke depan atau sekadar memberinya ruang berkreasi.
Sejauh ini, tidak ada yang bisa memainkan peran playmaker sebagus Pjanic. Dalam beberapa kesempatan, Sarri seringkali menempatkan Rodrigo Bentancur di posisi tersebut jika Pjanic sedang berhalangan tampil dan hasilnya kurang memuaskan.
Bentancur dikenal sebagai gelandang serba bisa. Saat bermain di posisi Pjanic pun performanya tidak begitu buruk. Namun ia tak memiliki kecakapan untuk mendistribusikan bola ke rekan-rekan setimnya dengan tempo yang diharapkan.

text:
Sorry, Ronaldo, the important player at Juventus right now is Pjanic
Nov 7 2019, 06:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Not infrequently the name Miralem Pjanic is reportedly at the exit of Juventus for several summers yesterday. But now, the Bosnian man is transformed into the figure of 'the new Jorginho' with Maurizio Sarri.
Like Jorginho, Pjanic also controlled the game from the inside of the attack. He is often flanked by two other midfielders who are ready to help him carry the ball forward or just give him room to be creative.
So far, no one can play the role of a playmaker as good as Pjanic. On several occasions, Sarri often put Rodrigo Bentancur in that position if Pjanic was unable to perform and the results were unsatisfactory.
Bentancur is known as a versatile midfielder. When playing in the position of Pjanic, his performance was not so bad. But he did not have the ability to distribute the ball to his teammates with the expected tempo.
